title: Hack The Box - Sau Writeup
tags: htb, hacking, hack the box, writeup, linux, web, sudo, SSRF, python, redteam
snippet: OverviewSau is an easy rated Linux machine on Hack The Box that is vulnerable to an SSRF exploit, and unauthorised RCE through a vulnerable internal web service.ReconFirstly, we start by running an nmap scan on the target IP with the command: nmap -vv -Pn -T4 -sCV [target IP]  -vv to increase nma...
